correcting some exception handling issues

Done
- Fixes #130 IllegalStateException in SSUtil.addAttachmentFromUri bug

correcting several message list UI issues

- Fixed intro/sling keys, not switching to threads view from messages
view
- Add filename when actual image cannot be displayed
- Fixes #117 conversation list position not always at bottom bug
- Fixes #122 long recipient name cuts off message count bug

corrected multiple exchange/logout issues

- Improved layout of all views for small screen densities.
- Fixes extra quit confirmation dialogs on exchange save.
- Fixes #114 notification logout action missing bug
- Fixes #118 logout action may relaunch passphrase activity bug
- Fixes #129 draft edit timestamp inaccurate bug

- Corrected scroll of last message so status can be seen esp. for images
- Closes #116 onboarding should default to sling keys bug

closing multiple ui issues for pending 1.8.4 release

- Closes #108 languages menu flickers on setup view bug
- Fixed readability on some menus for Lollipop.
- Fixed issue setting incoming introduction invitation.
- Fixed open source dialog stream.
Closes #121 setup passphrase IDE action inconsistent bug
auto-decrypt in background after every key update.

correcting back stack issues

- Prevented relaunch of app during logout notification action.
- Modified foreground notification to prevent closing pending exchange.
- Closed #83, android patterns update (modified manifest/flags to use
singleTask not singleTop in HomeActivity).

more small ui/debug fixes

- Added debug switch to test server

- Closes #120 multiple launches of showExchange bug

messenger release 1.8.4

v1.8.4
- Add attachment thumbnails to messages.
- Add open source licenses.
- Made logout actions consistent.
- Client-side migration to registration scheme using signed
registration ids.
- Fixed false updates of messages as sent for Gingerbread.
- Multiple bug fixes.
